title: Graphics Card Bug.
body: Tried to hop into a game and immediately my Windows Ten alert pops up stating that it has blocked League from using my Graphics card making the game unplayable. Please help.

replies.body: It sounds like your OS has a security setting in-place that's blocking you from launching the game, and not necessarily an issue with your card.  To start, I suggst going over each instruction in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is being added as an exception.  Test it in a custom game to prevent any penalties!  I hope that helps!
